summary: Fixes the issue to hire Jenassa while using version 1.3, which implements a new follower called Larethia in Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
This is a bugfixing mod for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289/?]Bosmer Armor Pack[/url] by maty743 version 1.3.

[b]Hi Guys.
Ghaunadaur changed his mind again. The fix is now available again![/b]

[u]Description:[/u]
If you use version 1.3 of the Bosmer Armor Pack, you can't hire Jenassa at The Drunken Horseman due to a script error. This small patch fixes the problem.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Diese Mod behebt ein Problem in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289/?]Bosmer Armor Pack[/url] by maty743 Version 1.3.

[b]Hallo, Leute.
Ghaunadaur hat seine Meinung erneut geändert. Der Fix steht nun wieder hier zur Verfügung![/b]

[u]Beschreibung:[/u]
Falls du Version 1.3  des Bosmer Armor Packs benutzt, kannst du Jenassa im Trunkenen Jägersmann nicht anheuern aufgrund eines Script-Fehlers. Dieser kleine Patch behebt das Problem.
author: Ghaunadaur
